content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the major factors responsible for the rise of anti-Semitism in nineteenth-century Europe.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the major factors responsible for the rise of anti-Semitism in nineteenth-century Europe.

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
